message: The term “sex trafficking” has a deceptively innocuous ring to it, which is sometimes taken as an indication that it’s not a particularly serious crime. Nothing could be further from the truth. Sex trafficking, particularly when a child is involved, is a crime with life-taking consequence.

data.description: Service Dogs to the Rescue By Dave Emanuel For most people, a dog is the family member who is always glad to see you and wants little more than some of your time, regular meals and a decent place to…
data.title: The Fight to End Child Sex Trafficking
